content.summary: $CONTENT_SUMMARY/Experienced Go Backend Engineer with 4+ years in distributed systems. Proven ability to develop high-performance Go applications, consolidate complex microservices, and work with SQL databases. Skilled in API design and ensuring system stability through comprehensive testing.

positions.title: $POSITION_TITLE_VD/Backend Engineer
bullets: Consolidated over 7 microservices into a single, highly efficient **Go** application, reducing compute costs by 70%.
Refactored existing deployment configurations in order to facilitate a cloud to **on-premise compute** migration.
Migrated existing code bases from **MongoDB** to **SQLite** and **PostgreSQL**.
Refactored legacy code bases, writing extensive unit **tests** and configuring **CI/CD** pipelines.

positions.title: $POSITION_TITLE_AM/Platform Engineer
bullets: Developed internal tooling in **TypeScript** and refactored an existing **Python** code base.
Led a comprehensive **Docker Compose** configuration refactor effort, automating developer onboarding.
Led a migration from **BitBucket** to **CircleCI**, reducing CI/CD pipeline run time from over an hour to 7 minutes.
Developed a release portal, connecting **AWS**, BitBucket, **Slack**, **JIRA**, Confluence, and **Jenkins** into a single application for production release automation.
Developed an advanced BitBucket pipeline runner capable of executing existing pipeline configurations locally using **Docker**.

positions.title: $POSITION_TITLE_KT/Backend Engineer
bullets: Refactored **Go** microservices, implementing new features and adding unit tests.
Improved service stability by writing tests covering over 90% of key packages.
Maintained and expanded **Kubernetes** cluster configurations on **Google Cloud** Platform.

positions.title: $POSITION_TITLE_CP/Fullstack Engineer
bullets: Developed internal tooling for Customer Support, QA, and Product teams.
Designed and implemented internal tooling in **Svelte** and **Go**, aggregating data from **Salesforce**, **JIRA**, ZenDesk, and **MongoDB** into a single customer support portal.
Developed performant customer-facing tools and **Chrome extensions**, reducing average issue resolution times by 35%.
Worked on unique customer implementations of ChiliPiper software in **WordPress**, **HubSpot**, and many more advanced flows.

skills: NIX, Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, GCP

projects.title: Aftermath
bullets: Highly rated Discord Bot for in-game progress tracking with a beautiful UI, written in **Go**.
Developed a custom **2D rendering** engine in order to render UIs into images consumable through Discord.

projects.title: Pulley
bullets: A user-friendly CLI tool written in **TypeScript**, designed to automate developer onboarding by setting up all required git repositories and generating a Docker Compose configuration file.
Pulley simplified a large chunk of the onboarding process at AlertMedia, saving over an hour of time for each new developer.

projects.title: Feedlr
bullets: Ad-free YouTube frontend alternative with build-in sponsor blocking and zero tracking, written in **TypeScript** and **Go**.
Implemented a system of proxies and authentication spoofing in order to serve a large number of users while using internal **Google APIs**.

projects.title: Listik
bullets: A user-friendly application for collaborating on shopping lists, written in **TypeScript** and **Go**
Developed with **Svelte** and **SQLite** in order to be extremely fast and simple.
